meanings.definition: A person who rides or manages horses.
meanings.sent1: The horseman guided the horses along the trail.
meanings.sent2: The horseman competed in the equestrian event.
meanings.sent3: The horseman tried to teach the horse to dance, but it just kept trotting.
meanings.sent4: She was a true horseman, able to understand the unspoken language of the animals.
meanings.sent5: The horseman's bond with the majestic creatures was truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: A skilled rider or trainer of horses.
meanings.sent1: The horseman gracefully rode the stallion through the fields.
meanings.sent2: The horseman spent hours training the young colt.
meanings.sent3: The horseman's hat flew off as he raced against the wind.
meanings.sent4: She was a horseman in the art of dressage, moving in perfect harmony with her mount.
meanings.sent5: The horseman's expertise in handling even the most spirited horses was unmatched.
